data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of genus Ablattaria Reitter (Coleoptera, Silphidae) using geometric morphometrics

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Qubaiova, Jarin, Ruzicka, Jan, Sipkova, Hana (2015): Taxonomic revision of genus Ablattaria Reitter (Coleoptera, Silphidae) using geometric morphometrics. ZooKeys 477: 79-142, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.477.8446, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.477.8446
